Pre-Game Insights: Uganda is making its ICC T20 World Cup debut
The team has been drilled with the right ideals and this was all set in motion in 2021 with the arrival of South African tactician Lawrence Mahatlane
They defeated Zimbabwe in the qualifiers in Namibia and secured the spot in unprecedented fashion
The coach for the World Cup is Abhay Sharma, who is big on processes and situations
Others: The match is set to take place at the Providence Stadium in Guyana
Captain Brian Masaba wants the boys to play the match, not the teams
The team got a chance to meet Team Australia and this could give them the push they need to believe in their ability
Ugandans will have to be up in the wee hours of the morning in order to catch their favourite team
